settings.text_sTA3TlMCaMCymiYD:
The K9 Snack & Support Bundle is here to make your dog's gut health journey simple and scrumptious!

  • Digestive-K9 Powder for daily gut support

  • DigestiveK9Chews for on-the-go convenience

  • ProteinPuffs for a deliciously healthy treat any time

Daily digestive care that'll keep your dog's gut thriving, with a side of YUM from our mouth-watering single-protein treats.
settings.text_rrfgo5OmkjrVF7Tc:
Real and honest reviews from horse owners using the Gut Health Reset Pack.

These results reflect the unique experiences of real customers. These observations are not intended to replace advice from your veterinarian and are not guaranteed.

settings.text_71kRhZSAUOeBp2kv: Poseidon Animal Health was founded in Australia in 2017, with a focus on targeted, evidence-based gut health solutions. After creating our successful equine range, we applied that same science-led approach to canine health. We are based in the Illawarra Region of NSW, with manufacturing facilities in Australia, New Zealand and USA. We also export to Europe, the Middle East and Asia.
settings.text_nh6jyYBjGZ2zDS8y: DigestiveK9 is a daily gut health supplement formulated by a team of canine nutritionists, microbiologists and veterinarians to support the entire digestive tract. DigestiveK9 is designed to support digestion, immunity, skin health, and behaviour.
settings.text_kDVOEtDEMl6T8NWm:
DigestiveK9 stands apart in three key ways:

  • It uses a powerful blend of prebiotics, postbiotics, para-probiotics, amino acids and digestive enzymes - developed using a unique canine-specific culture.

  • It contains no synthetic additives or artificial preservatives - only active, non-GMO ingredients that support the whole gut.

  • Our Bio-K9® blend is fermented using Lactobacillus acidophilus D2 to deliver stable, shelf-ready metabolites that help calm inflammation and support the immune system.
settings.text_55u7BsPw1OsaVENY:
DigestiveK9 Powder and Chews both contain our Bio-K9® blend along with a host of natural ingredients like organic spirulina, carrot fibre, organic ginger, green lipped mussel and many others for added gut and immune support.

Please note: Some ingredients vary between our Powder and Chews.

Some additional natural ingredients have been added to create the shape and texture of our Chews (for example, Tapioca and Potato Starch).

Our Powder contains yummy, nutritious Beef Bone Broth, while our Chews do not contain any meat-based ingredients. If your dog is sensitive to beef, we recommend using the Chews only.

Head to each individual product page to see a full breakdown of ingredients.

Our ProteinPuffs are deliciously healthy, freeze-dried, single protein treats that dogs love. With a hint of added Bio-K9®, they're a guilt-free, mindful snack you can feel good about - plus they make fantastic training treats too! This bundle comes with both of our current ProteinPuffs: Kangaroo and Turkey.

Contact info@poseidonanimalhealth.com if you need help deciding which product is right for your dog.
settings.text_tY7PsYYgZxuVf5eo:
We recommend daily use to support your dog’s gut and overall wellbeing. DigestiveK9 is safe for all dog breeds and life stages and is designed to be used as a long-term supplement solution, so there’s no need to worry about having to wean your dog off the product and find issues return.   

Modern diets, stress, medications, and environmental toxins can all impact the gut microbiome. If your dog displays signs of digestive upset, itchy skin, bad breath, food sensitivities, or low energy, it could indicate poor gut health. DigestiveK9 helps restore balance, reduce inflammation, and support better digestion, immunity, and behaviour - every day.
settings.text_SgAI3tAEHgiEFPJC: How Do I Feed Each Product In The K9 Snack & Support Bundle?
settings.text_2nMgIi98RyXSiqWU:
Powder Daily Feed Rate

Feed ¼ scoop of powder per 5kg of body weight.

*If your dog is between weights, it is safe to round up. For example, a 7kg dog would receive ½ scoop per day.

Chews Daily Feed Rate

Depending on your dog’s weight, feed from 1 up to 5 chews per day (see table below for reference): 

  • Up to 5kg – 1 Chew

  • 5 - 10kg – 2 Chews 

  • 10 - 15kg – 3 Chews

  • 15 - 20kg - 4 Chews

  • Over 20kg - 5 Chews

ProteinPuffs are a healthy treat that may be fed in moderation. Daily consumption is more than safe for most dogs. Treats should make up no more than 10% of your dog's daily dietary intake.

Visit our ProteinPuffs page for more information.

Introduction of DigestiveK9

Introduce each product slowly over 14 days, starting with ¼ of the recommended serve and increasing gradually. For dogs under 5kg, begin with a light sprinkle of powder or half a chew.

Interchanging Between DigestiveK9 Powder & Chews

Our DigestiveK9 Hero Duo Bundle is designed to make your life easier by offering the same gut support in two different formulations. You can easily switch between the two without skipping your dog's daily gut health goals.

Note: There is no need to double up or feed more than a daily serve if using both products in a 24 hour period - each product will provide the same level of digestive support, so we recommend splitting the serve between the two products if feeding both on the same day.

Example Feeding Routine (For The Weekend Adventurer):

Mon - Fri: Feed a daily serve of Powder with your dog's dinner each night.

Sat - Sun: Feed a daily serve of Chews instead of the Powder if on the go or taking a trip.

Large dog owners: Feed their daily amount of chews tossed into one of their meals, or feed sporadically throughout the day - either way, they'll be supported!

Example Feeding Routine (If Your Dog Craves Variety):

Daily: Feed 1/2 a daily serve of Chews in the morning with or after breakfast, followed by 1/2 a daily serve of Powder in the evening with dinner.

While some dogs show changes quickly, best results are typically seen after 6-12 weeks of daily use.
settings.text_IjiGgZeFZmVt6qdK:
Will they ever! DigestiveK9 is highly palatable, and Many owners report their dog won’t eat without it! The powder blends easily with your dog's regular food and is loved by even by the fussiest eaters, while the chews have a wonderful smoky flavour that dogs can't get enough of. Meanwhile over in the treats aisle, our ProteinPuffs are fast becoming an obsession with every dog who tries them!

It is extremely rare, but if your dog happens to show any hesitation or disinterest in consuming our products after 1 week of daily feeding attempts, please reach out to our customer service team for helpful advice and further support. We’re here to help with your dog's journey to better health.
settings.text_Ll7GM9hF5AVijagh: Can I Use This Bundle With Other Supplements?
settings.text_zVYyHrFIC6HOWB1R:
DigestiveK9 and ProteinPuffs are both safe to feed alongside most other supplements. Each ingredient plays a specific role, and the formulation is designed to complement your dog’s existing routine.

As with any supplement, we recommend consulting your veterinarian, particularly if your dog is on existing medication or has a medical condition. DigestiveK9 contains no chicken and is suitable for dogs with common protein sensitivities.
